name: Chocolate makes you happy: St.Patrick's Day
name_original: Chocolate makes you happy: St.Patrick's Day
description:
Casual colorful physical puzzle with sweets, jumpers, teleports, accelerators, reverse gravity, traps, treadmills, clovers, rainbows, St.Patrick's Day art and explosions.
The goal of the player is to keep the cookies on the chocolate bar for some time to pass the level.

In Chocolate makes you happy: St.Patrick's Day:
- 50 levels
- Explosions
- Jumpers
- Teleports
- Sweets
- Accelerators
- Traps
- Changing gravity
- Clovers
- Rainbows
- St.Patrick's Day art
